item.title: Lindsay add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "We must not see any person as an abstraction. Instead, we must see in every person a universe with its own secrets, with its own treasures, with its own sources of anguish, and with some measure of triumph." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I privately say to you, old friend... please accept from me this unpretentious bouquet of early-blooming parentheses: (((())))." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Rudyard Kipling
item.description: "I am, by calling, a dealer in words; and words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind." -- Rudyard Kipling

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by François Rabelais
item.description: "I go to seek a Great Perhaps." -- François Rabelais

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by JK Rowling
item.description: "Words are, in my not-so-humble opinion, our most inexhaustible source of magic. Capable of both inflicting injury, and remedying it." -- JK Rowling

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "She is too fond of books, and it has addled her brain." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by John Lennon
item.description:
"Imagine there's no countries It isn't hard to do Nothing to kill or die for And no religion too Imagine all the people Living life in peace
You may say that I'm a dreamer But I'm not the only one I hope someday you'll join us And the world will be as one" -- John Lennon

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We've all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That's who we really are." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lindsay add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "I write to discover what I know." -- Flannery O'Connor
